availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Military organization. Raised under act of legislation dated January 1864 that allowed Kentucky governor to raise forces in defense of the state. Operated between Ohio and Green Rivers between January 1865 and August 1865. Commander (s): Major John W. Swinker.

ab.bibl:
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 799.
Thomas Speed, The Union Cause in Kentucky: 1860-1865 (New York, NY: The Knickerbocker Press, 1907), 317-318.
